Posts.Content: Ecila2u wrote: Hello everyone---Have anyone tried Lupron?? My best friend is having side effects from medication. It seems like daily she is finding knots and hive like symptoms on her body. She was told that her body is trying to reject the chemo. Have any of you ever experience this?? I am new to this forum, so please forgive me if this has been asked many times before. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lupron Ecila2u Ecila2u
